column4: hi all. I have 2 interfaces eth0 and eth1. They have an ip like 192.168.0.x. I want to force the use of eth1 for routing to the 192.168.0.0/24 subnet.. how do I do that ?
hey all. I have 2 interfaces in the same subnet. How can I force my machine to use eth1 to communicate to the subnet instead of eth0?
Reverse their entries in the files: /etc/network/interfaces  and /etc/iftab
